## Protocol.Browser.PermissionDescriptor.name property

Name of permission. See https://cs.chromium.org/chromium/src/third\_party/blink/renderer/modules/permissions/permission\_descriptor.idl for valid permission names.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
name: string;
```
